Modern Skyn Alchemy Masque, Chamomile and Lavender

Brand: Modern Skyn Alchemy

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Kaolin (White Clay),*Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour,*Lavan*dula Angustifolia, Chamomilla Recutita Flower,*Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil,
book: 2374-Modern Skyn Alchemy Masque, Chamomile and Lavender

chunk:
Ingredients: Kaolin (White Clay),*Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour,*Lavan*dula Angustifolia, Chamomilla Recutita Flower,*Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil,

Directions: Mix 1 tsp. mask with 1 tsp. of water to make a paste. Apply to face, neck & chest. Allow 5 minutes to dry, rinse. Please avoid the eyes. Follow with a moisturizer.
book: 2374-Modern Skyn Alchemy Masque, Chamomile and Lavender
